description: Create, edit, and collaborate on spreadsheets online

actions.name: clear_sheet
actions.description: Clears all rows on an existing sheet.

actions.name: copy-worksheet
actions.description: Creates a new worksheet by copying an existing one.

actions.name: create-column
actions.description: Creates a new column in a specific spreadsheet.

actions.name: create-spreadsheet
actions.description: Creates a blank spreadsheet.

actions.name: create-worksheet
actions.description: Create a new blank worksheet with a title.

actions.name: delete_row
actions.description: Delete a specific row from the selected sheet.

actions.name: delete-worksheet
actions.description: Permanently delete a specific worksheet.

actions.name: export_sheet
actions.description: Download a worksheet as a CSV or TSV file.

actions.name: find_row_by_num
actions.description: Retrieve a specific row using its unique ID.

actions.name: find_rows
actions.description: Look up rows in a worksheet based on a column value.

actions.name: find_spreadsheets
actions.description: Find spreadsheet(s) by name.

actions.name: find-worksheet
actions.description: Finds a worksheet(s) by title.

actions.name: format-row
actions.description: Format one or multiple rows in specific spreadsheet.

actions.name: get-many-rows
actions.description: Get all the rows from a specific sheet.

actions.name: get_next_rows
actions.description: Get next group of rows from a specifiec workheet

actions.name: google-sheets-insert-multiple-rows
actions.description: Add multiple rows of data at once to a specific spreadsheet.

actions.name: insert_row
actions.description: Add a new row of data to a specific spreadsheet.

actions.name: rename-worksheet
actions.description: Rename specific worksheet.

actions.name: update-multiple-rows
actions.description: Updates multiple rows in a specific spreadsheet.

actions.name: update_row
actions.description: Update the data in an existing row.

actions.name: custom_api_call
actions.description: Make a custom API call

triggers.name: google-sheets-new-or-updated-row
triggers.description: Triggers when a new row is added or modified in a spreadsheet.

triggers.name: googlesheets_new_row_added
triggers.description: Triggers when a new row is added to bottom of a spreadsheet.

triggers.name: new-spreadsheet
triggers.description: Triggers when a new spreadsheet is created.

triggers.name: new-worksheet
triggers.description: Triggers when a worksheet is created in a spreadsheet.
